title: NIST Ion Clock Sets New Record for Most Accurate Clock in the World
summary:
NIST researchers have developed the most accurate atomic clock to date, an aluminum ion-based "quantum logic clock," achieving timekeeping accuracy to 19 decimal places. This breakthrough significantly improves upon previous records, boasting 41% greater accuracy and 2.6 times more stability than any other ion clock.

The clock's enhanced accuracy stems from 20 years of continuous development and improvements across all its components. The key innovation is the "buddy system" of pairing an aluminum ion (for its steady ticking) with a magnesium ion (for laser cooling and state readout). The team addressed challenges like excess micromotion of the ions by redesigning the ion trap with a thicker diamond wafer and improved gold coatings, and reduced hydrogen interference by rebuilding the vacuum chamber with titanium.

Further enhancing stability, the team collaborated with Jun Ye at JILA to utilize an ultrastable laser via fiber links, reducing quantum fluctuations. This allowed the team to probe the ions for a full second, drastically cutting down the averaging time needed to reach the 19th decimal place from weeks to a day and a half.

This record-breaking accuracy contributes to the international effort to redefine the second and opens doors for advancements in quantum physics, quantum technology, geodesy, and exploration of physics beyond the Standard Model, such as investigating the constancy of fundamental constants. Researchers plan to further enhance the clock's capabilities by scaling up the number of ions and entangling them.
chinese_title: 美国国家标准与技术研究院离子钟创下世界最精准时钟新纪录
chinese_summary:

该时钟精度的提高源于20年来对其所有组件的持续开发和改进。其关键创新在于将铝离子（用于其稳定的滴答声）与镁离子（用于激光冷却和状态读出）配对的“伙伴系统”。该团队通过重新设计离子阱，采用更厚的金刚石晶圆和改进的镀金涂层，解决了离子过度微运动等难题，并通过用钛重建真空室来减少氢气的干扰。

为了进一步提高稳定性，该团队与JILA的Jun Ye合作，通过光纤链路利用超稳激光器，减少了量子波动。这使得该团队能够探测离子整整一秒钟，从而大大缩短了达到第19位小数所需的平均时间，从几周缩短到一天半。

这项破纪录的精度有助于国际社会重新定义秒，并为量子物理、量子技术、大地测量学以及探索超越标准模型的物理学（例如研究基本常数的恒定性）打开了大门。研究人员计划通过扩大离子数量并使它们纠缠来进一步增强时钟的功能。

title: Show HN: Shoggoth Mini – A soft tentacle robot powered by GPT-4o and RL
summary:
Shoggoth Mini is a soft tentacle robot project exploring expressiveness in robots beyond utilitarian functionality. The creator, Matthieu B. Le Cauchois, was inspired by Apple's ELEGNT paper and SpiRobs, aiming to imbue the robot with a sense of aliveness through motion.

The project involved hardware design, starting with a simple base and evolving into a dome-shaped head with stereo cameras ("eyes"). Cable tangling issues were resolved with spool covers, and a calibration script improved tension control. The spine was thickened to prevent sagging.

Control is achieved through a two-layered system: low-level control using both open-loop primitives and closed-loop reinforcement learning (RL) policies (like finger tracking), and high-level control using GPT-4o's real-time API which streams audio and text. Vision events are processed to provide GPT-4o cues. A 2D projection was key to simplifying both manual and automated control, mapping trackpad movements to tendon lengths.

Perception relies on MediaPipe for hand tracking and a YOLO model trained on a custom dataset for tentacle tip tracking. RL, specifically PPO, was used to train the robot to follow a user's finger. Sim-to-real transfer was improved with dynamics randomization and a constrained action space.

The author observed that predictability reduced the feeling of aliveness. Future directions include giving the robot a voice, expanding its expressive repertoire, adding more tentacles, and using direct drive motors. The project's code and 3D printing files are available on GitHub.

title: Reflections on OpenAI
summary:
This article is a reflection on the author's one-year experience working at OpenAI, from May 2024 to July 2025. The author highlights OpenAI's rapid growth (from 1,000 to 3,000 employees in a year) and its impact on the company culture and operations. Communication is heavily reliant on Slack, and the organization is described as bottoms-up and meritocratic, where good ideas and execution are highly valued. There's a strong bias for action and rapid iteration.

The author notes the unusual scrutiny and secrecy surrounding OpenAI due to its high-profile work and consumer focus. Despite the pressure, the author believes the employees are genuinely trying to do the right thing. The company is described as aiming to distribute the benefits of AI widely. Safety, particularly addressing practical risks, is a significant concern.

The article delves into the engineering side, mentioning the use of a large Python monorepo running on Azure. The infrastructure is influenced by a strong Meta/Instagram pipeline, with in-house implementations of various systems. The author learned about the scale and impact of a major consumer brand like ChatGPT, the high-level process of training large models, and the importance of GPU benchmarking.

Overall, the author portrays OpenAI as a highly ambitious organization competing in multiple arenas simultaneously, fostering a culture of rapid innovation and adaptation despite the challenges of scaling and intense public scrutiny. The author left seeking a fresh start but acknowledges the significant impact and valuable experience gained at OpenAI.

title: LLM Inevitabilism
summary:
This article argues against the "inevitabilism" surrounding the rise of large language models (LLMs) and artificial intelligence. The author defines inevitabilism as the framing of a particular future as inevitable, thereby limiting the scope of discussion to adaptation rather than questioning the desirability of that future.

Drawing a parallel to debate tactics, the author explains how framing an argument is crucial to controlling the conversation. They cite examples of tech leaders like Mark Zuckerberg, Andrew Ng, and Ginni Rometty using inevitabilist language to push the idea that AI is not something to be questioned, but something to be embraced and adapted to. These statements often carry an implicit threat, suggesting that those who resist will be left behind.

The author critiques this framing, arguing that it stifles critical discussion about the kind of future we want to create. They contend that we do have a choice in how we develop and utilize technology, and that succumbing to the narrative of inevitability surrenders that agency.

Ultimately, the article is a call to action, urging readers to resist the allure of inevitabilism, envision the future they desire, and actively fight for it, rather than passively accepting a future dictated by technological determinism. The author specifically targets the narrative surrounding LLMs and their role in shaping the future, suggesting that we should critically evaluate their potential impact and make conscious choices about their integration into society.

作者通过类比辩论技巧解释了如何通过框架论证来控制对话。他们引用了马克·扎克伯格、吴恩达和罗睿兰等科技领袖使用必然论语言来推销这样一种观点，即人工智能不是应该质疑的东西，而是应该拥抱和适应的东西。这些说法往往带有隐性的威胁，暗示那些抵制者将会落后。

作者批判了这种框架，认为它扼杀了关于我们想要创造的未来类型的批判性讨论。他们认为，我们在如何开发和利用技术方面确实有选择，而屈服于必然性的叙事会放弃这种能动性。

最终，本文是一项行动号召，敦促读者抵制必然论的诱惑，展望他们渴望的未来，并积极为之奋斗，而不是被动地接受由技术决定论所决定的未来。作者特别针对围绕LLMs及其在塑造未来中的作用的叙事，建议我们应该批判性地评估它们的潜在影响，并就它们融入社会做出有意识的选择。

title: Adding lookbehinds to rust-lang/regex
summary:
This article details the implementation of unbounded, captureless lookbehinds in the Rust's official `regex` crate, a significant upgrade from many existing regex engines. It highlights the architecture of the `regex`, `regex-automata`, and `regex-syntax` crates involved. The core work involved creating "WriteLookAround" and "CheckLookAround" NFA state types and integrating them into the PikeVM engine.

Challenges included ensuring the meta-engine only used PikeVM for regexes with lookbehinds, prioritizing deeply nested lookbehind threads, and addressing performance bottlenecks discovered through benchmarking. Initially, lookbehind sub-automata were prioritized too highly, causing unnecessary full haystack scans. This was resolved by separating lookbehind threads from the main regex threads.

Another performance issue arose with match-all searches, where lookbehind threads were discarded between matches, leading to quadratic runtime complexity. This was fixed by preserving and restoring lookbehind threads between iterations.

The implementation includes unit and integration tests to ensure correctness and maintain linear runtime complexity. This enhancement makes the Rust `regex` crate more powerful and versatile, while preserving its performance characteristics.

title: To be a better programmer, write little proofs in your head
summary:
This article encourages programmers to mentally "sketch proofs" while coding to improve speed and accuracy. This involves reasoning about code on the fly, a skill that develops with practice. The author provides several examples of reasoning techniques, including:

*   **Monotonicity:** Identifying parts of the code that only move forward (like checkpointing or LSM trees) to rule out many possible outcomes. Immutability is described as a cousin of monotonicity.

*   **Pre- and Post-conditions:** Defining what's assumed to be true before and after a function runs. This aids reasoning and helps generate unit tests.

*   **Invariants:** Identifying things that should always be true during code execution, ensuring consistency.

*   **Isolation:** Limiting the "blast radius" of code changes by identifying "firewalls" that prevent unintended propagation. This helps prove that unchanged behaviors remain unaffected.

*   **Induction:** Applying inductive reasoning to recursive functions and data structures (like trees and lists) to prove correctness. It involves proving a base case and demonstrating that if a condition holds for `n`, it also holds for `n+1`.

By consciously applying these techniques, programmers can increase their confidence in code correctness, reducing debugging time and improving overall efficiency. The key is to develop the habit of reasoning about code properties as it's being written.
chinese_title: 成为更好的程序员，在脑海中进行小型证明。
chinese_summary:
本文鼓励程序员在编写代码时进行“草图证明”式的思考，以提高速度和准确性。这涉及即时推理代码，这是一项通过实践培养的技能。作者提供了几个推理技巧的例子，包括：

*   **单调性：** 识别代码中仅向前移动的部分（如检查点或LSM树），以排除许多可能的结果。 不可变性被描述为单调性的近亲。

*   **前置和后置条件：** 定义函数运行前后应该为真的条件。 这有助于推理并生成单元测试。

*   **不变性：** 识别代码执行期间应始终为真的条件，以确保一致性。

*   **隔离：** 通过识别防止意外传播的“防火墙”来限制代码更改的“爆炸半径”。 这有助于证明未更改的行为保持不变。

*   **归纳法：** 将归纳推理应用于递归函数和数据结构（如树和列表），以证明正确性。 它涉及证明基本情况，并证明如果条件对 `n` 成立，则它也对 `n+1` 成立。

通过有意识地应用这些技术，程序员可以增强对代码正确性的信心，减少调试时间并提高整体效率。 关键是养成在编写代码时推理代码属性的习惯。

title: Show HN: We made our own inference engine for Apple Silicon
summary:
Uzu is a new high-performance inference engine specifically designed for running AI models on Apple Silicon. It offers a simple API, a hybrid architecture utilizing both GPU kernels and MPSGraph for optimal performance, unified model configurations, and traceable computations for correctness.

The engine uses its own model format, convertible from other formats using the `lalamo` tool. Pre-built Swift bindings (`uzu-swift`) are provided for easy integration with Swift projects. A command-line interface (`uzu_cli`) allows running models or starting a server.

The quick start guide demonstrates how to integrate uzu into a Rust project, load a model, and run inference. Performance benchmarks on an Apple M2 show promising results, often outperforming `llama.cpp` in bf16/f16 precision for various models, including Llama-3.2-1B-Instruct, Qwen, and Gemma. The performance benefits are especially noticeable on smaller models. The project is open-sourced under the MIT license.

title: Petabit-class transmission over > 1000 km using standard 19-core optical fiber
summary:
NICT and Sumitomo Electric announced a new world record in optical fiber communication, achieving 1.02 petabits per second data transmission over 1,808 kilometers using a specially designed 19-core optical fiber with a standard 0.125 mm cladding diameter. This achievement boasts a capacity-distance product of 1.86 exabits per second x km, the highest ever recorded.

The key to this breakthrough lies in the development of a novel 19-core optical fiber with low loss across multiple wavelength bands (C-band and L-band) and a compatible optical amplification system. This allows for a dramatic extension of the transmission distance compared to previous demonstrations using similar fibers over shorter distances.

The transmission system utilized a recirculating loop setup, with 19 cores and optical amplifiers to boost the signal. Digital signal processing, specifically MIMO, eliminated interference between the cores. The result showcases the potential for future scalable, high-capacity networks to meet the growing demand for data, particularly in post-5G societies.

The research was presented as a post-deadline paper at the Optical Fiber Communication Conference (OFC 2025), recognizing its significance in advancing long-distance, high-capacity optical communication infrastructure. NICT focused on the transmission system design and experiments, while Sumitomo Electric handled the design and manufacture of the 19-core optical fiber.

title: Apple's MLX adding CUDA support
summary:
This GitHub issue discusses the addition of a CUDA backend to Apple's MLX machine learning framework. The goal is to enable MLX to leverage NVIDIA GPUs for both local development (on Macs) and deployment on high-performance computing systems. The primary author, zcbenz, is working on this feature with sponsorship from Apple.

The initial pull request introduces the basic CUDA infrastructure, allowing a simple tutorial example to run.  Developers express interest in adding ROCm (AMD GPU) support as well.  Discussion focuses on how to best integrate the CUDA backend into MLX, with a preference for merging incremental PRs for easier maintenance and testing through CI.

The author shares details about the challenges of porting kernels to CUDA, specifically regarding passing shape/strides and optimizing kernel performance. Significant performance improvements are achieved by switching to `cudaEvent` for event handling, reducing prefetch calls, and temporarily delaying the destruction of operands and temporaries (though this last optimization raises concerns about memory usage for large graphs and is marked for further configuration).

The performance analysis shows overheads in kernel launching and synchronization, which are addressed through several optimizations. The logistic regression example runs successfully, with performance improving from 500 iterations/second to 2100 iterations/second. Buffer cache implementation is planned for a later stage.

The initial pull request was eventually closed as the backbone was merged into main, with additional commits pushed for specific functionalities like matrix multiplication and sorting.

作者分享了将内核移植到CUDA的挑战，特别是关于传递形状/步幅以及优化内核性能方面。通过切换到`cudaEvent`进行事件处理、减少预取调用以及暂时延迟操作数和临时变量的销毁（尽管最后一个优化引发了对大型图内存使用的担忧，并被标记为进一步配置），实现了显著的性能改进。

title: Cloudflare Starts Blocking Pirate Sites for UK Users
summary:
The article reports that Cloudflare has begun blocking access to around 200 pirate site domains for users in the UK, triggered by a legal order requested by the Motion Picture Association (MPA). This is a significant shift, as previously, blocking was primarily handled by individual UK Internet Service Providers (ISPs) like BT, Virgin Media, and Sky.

Cloudflare is implementing this block through Error 451, indicating a website is blocked for legal reasons specific to the UK. While Cloudflare generally resists blocking orders, they comply when proportionality, due process, and transparency principles are upheld. However, the transparency surrounding this particular order is limited. The link provided by Cloudflare to details about the order leads to the Lumen Database, but lacks specifics like the requesting party and issuing authority.

Interestingly, the linked notice is one sent to Google, not Cloudflare, regarding the de-indexing of the same domains from Google Search. It's also dated over a year ago, raising questions about the timing and nature of Cloudflare's involvement.

Cloudflare is utilizing geo-blocking, impacting even UK-based VPN users attempting to access these sites. While the article initially mentions around 200 domains, it suggests the scale could be far larger, potentially involving hundreds or thousands of domains blocked by the MPA. The blocked sites are flagged as triggering serious malware warnings, so users are advised to avoid them. This Cloudflare blocking seems to be in addition to, and separate from, blocking efforts by individual ISPs.

title: Literalism plaguing today’s movies
summary:
This article critiques a trend in recent movies the author calls "The New Literalism." It's characterized by heavy-handedness, a tendency to state the obvious, and a lack of subtlety, which ultimately diminishes the art. The author illustrates this with hypothetical examples from "Gladiator II," "Megalopolis," and "The Apprentice," where characters inexplicably verbalize metaphors in an extremely direct and jarring manner.

The author contends that this literalism pervades even acclaimed films, citing examples from the Academy Award nominees such as "Dune: Part Two," "Wicked," "A Complete Unknown," "Anora," "The Substance," "Emilia Pérez," "Nickel Boys," "The Brutalist," and "I'm Still Here." These films, according to the author, rely on predictable formulas, gratuitous visual cues, and explicit restatements of themes, instead of leaving room for interpretation.

The author connects this trend to a broader cultural phenomenon: a preference for the familiar, formulaic, and easily digestible content. This, they argue, stems from an anxiety about the overwhelming nature of contemporary life, leading to a desire for "predigested cultural comfort food." This also includes our obsession with repetition, leading to "reënactment" over truly reflecting on history.

Ultimately, the author sees "New Literalism" as a form of condescension towards the audience, where content is reduced to easily recognizable concepts suitable for "banner ads."

The article concludes with a glimmer of hope, praising Edward Berger’s "Conclave" as an exception, a film that trusts the audience to engage with ambiguity and subtlety, making it a refreshing contrast to the prevalent "New Literalism."
chinese_title: 直白主义困扰当今电影
chinese_summary:
本文批判了近期电影中一种被称为“新字面主义”的趋势。它的特点是笨拙、倾向于陈述显而易见的事实以及缺乏微妙性，最终削弱了艺术性。作者用来自《角斗士2》、《大都会》和《学徒》的假设例子来说明这一点，其中人物莫名其妙地以一种极其直接和刺耳的方式口头表达隐喻。

作者认为，这种字面主义甚至渗透到备受赞誉的电影中，并引用了奥斯卡金像奖提名影片中的例子，如《沙丘：第二部》、《魔法坏女巫》、《完全未知》、《阿诺拉》、《实质》、《艾米莉亚·佩雷斯》、《镍男孩》、《野兽派》、《我还在这里》。作者认为，这些电影依赖于可预测的公式、无意义的视觉暗示以及对主题的明确重述，而不是留下解释的空间。

作者将这一趋势与更广泛的文化现象联系起来：一种对熟悉、公式化和易于消化的内容的偏好。他们认为，这源于对当代生活压倒性本质的焦虑，导致人们渴望“预先消化的文化舒适食物”。这也包括我们对重复的痴迷，导致“重新演绎”而不是真正反思历史。

最终，作者认为“新字面主义”是对观众的一种屈尊，其中内容被简化为适合“横幅广告”的易于识别的概念。

文章以一线希望结束，赞扬爱德华·伯格的《教皇选举》作为一个例外，这部电影相信观众能够理解模糊性和微妙性，使其与流行的“新字面主义”形成令人耳目一新的对比。

title: Kiro: A new agentic IDE
summary:
Kiro is a new AI-powered IDE designed to bridge the gap between AI-assisted prototyping and production-ready software. It emphasizes "spec-driven development" to address the challenges of undocumented assumptions, unclear requirements, and design complexities inherent in AI-generated code.

Kiro introduces two key features: **Specs and Hooks.** Specs are artifacts that help developers think through features in-depth, refactor code upfront, and understand system behavior. Kiro unpacks requirements from a single prompt, generating user stories with acceptance criteria, technical design documents (data flow diagrams, interfaces, database schemas), and implementation tasks with details like unit tests, integration tests, and accessibility considerations. Specs also stay synced with the evolving codebase.

Hooks are event-driven automations that act like experienced developers, catching inconsistencies and completing boilerplate tasks. These triggers are based on file saves, creations, or deletions, and can be customized to enforce coding standards, update documentation, or scan for security vulnerabilities.

Beyond Specs and Hooks, Kiro includes features like Model Context Protocol (MCP) support, steering rules, and agentic chat. It's built on Code OSS, ensuring compatibility with VS Code settings and plugins.

Kiro aims to improve team design alignment, resolve conflicting requirements, reduce tech debt, improve code reviews, and preserve institutional knowledge. Kiro is currently free during preview and available on Mac, Windows, and Linux, supporting most popular languages. It offers a hands-on tutorial.
chinese_title: Kiro：一个全新的自主型IDE
chinese_summary:
Kiro：一款弥合 AI 辅助原型设计与可用于生产的软件之间差距的全新 AI 驱动 IDE。它强调“规范驱动开发”，以解决 AI 生成代码中固有的未文档化假设、不明确的需求和设计复杂性等挑战。

Kiro 引入了两项关键功能：**规范 (Specs) 和钩子 (Hooks)。** 规范是帮助开发者深入思考功能、提前重构代码和理解系统行为的工件。 Kiro 从单个提示中提取需求，生成包含验收标准的用户故事、技术设计文档（数据流图、接口、数据库模式）以及包含单元测试、集成测试和可访问性考虑等详细信息的实现任务。 规范还会与不断演变的代码库保持同步。

钩子是事件驱动的自动化程序，其作用类似于经验丰富的开发者，可以发现不一致之处并完成样板任务。 这些触发器基于文件保存、创建或删除操作，并且可以自定义以强制执行编码标准、更新文档或扫描安全漏洞。

除了规范和钩子之外，Kiro 还包括模型上下文协议 (MCP) 支持、指导规则和代理式聊天等功能。 它基于 Code OSS 构建，确保与 VS Code 设置和插件的兼容性。

Kiro 旨在改善团队设计一致性、解决冲突的需求、减少技术债务、改进代码审查并保留机构知识。 Kiro 目前在预览期间免费，并且可在 Mac、Windows 和 Linux 上使用，支持大多数流行的语言。 它提供了一个动手教程。

title: VHS, VCDs, and Laserdiscs in Southeast Asia
summary:
This article explores the popularity of VHS, VCDs, and Laserdiscs in Southeast Asia, particularly Singapore, contrasting it with the dominance of VHS in Western markets like Australia and the US. While VHS tapes were available in Singapore, VCDs and Laserdiscs gained more traction. The common explanation for this is the tropical climate causing mold issues on tapes, which is partly true; tapes brought from Australia often developed mold. However, locally produced VHS tapes in Singapore seemed less susceptible.

Laserdiscs, popular among affluent movie enthusiasts and rental stores due to their superior longevity in humid climates and integration with the Japanese export market, were still expensive. VCDs then became the dominant format in the 1990s because of their affordability and ease of distribution.

VCDs, leveraging the same technology as audio CDs, compressed video into a smaller size, allowing it to be stored on a CD. Advantages included small size, durability, and the ability to be easily mass-produced and pirated. The prevalence of pirate VCDs, readily available for a few dollars, made them a popular choice, especially given the Singaporean government's clampdown, which caused the pirated market to move to Malaysia. Legitimate VCDs also existed, offering affordable access to popular shows.

The article concludes that while climate played a role, economics was a significant driving factor in the popularity of VCDs in Southeast Asia, lasting into the DVD era as a more affordable option.
chinese_title: 东南亚的录像带、VCD和激光影碟
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了录像带(VHS)、VCD和激光影碟在东南亚（尤其是新加坡）的流行，并将其与录像带在澳大利亚和美国等西方市场的主导地位进行对比。虽然新加坡有售录像带，但VCD和激光影碟获得了更多的青睐。对此常见的解释是热带气候导致录像带发霉，这在一定程度上是事实；从澳大利亚带来的录像带经常发霉。然而，新加坡本地生产的录像带似乎不太容易受到影响。

激光影碟因其在潮湿气候中的卓越耐久性以及与日本出口市场的融合而受到富裕电影爱好者和租赁商店的欢迎，但仍然价格昂贵。之后，VCD在20世纪90年代凭借其经济实惠和易于分发的特点成为主流格式。

VCD利用与音频CD相同的技术，将视频压缩成更小的尺寸，使其可以存储在CD上。其优点包括体积小、耐用以及易于大规模生产和盗版。盗版VCD的盛行，以几美元的价格随处可见，使其成为一个受欢迎的选择，特别是考虑到新加坡政府的打击，导致盗版市场转移到马来西亚。正版VCD也存在，以实惠的价格提供流行节目的观看途径。

文章总结认为，虽然气候起到了一定的作用，但经济因素是VCD在东南亚流行的重要驱动因素，作为一种更经济实惠的选择，VCD一直持续到DVD时代。

title: LIGO detects most massive black hole merger to date
summary:
The LIGO-Virgo-KAGRA (LVK) Collaboration detected the most massive black hole merger to date, designated GW231123, on November 23, 2023. This powerful merger resulted in a final black hole with a mass of approximately 225 times that of our Sun, surpassing the previous record holder from 2021. The black hole was formed by the collision of two black holes, each approximately 100 and 140 times the mass of the Sun, which were also rapidly spinning.

This discovery challenges current astrophysical models of black hole formation because black holes of this mass are not expected through standard stellar evolution. Researchers suggest that the black holes might have formed through earlier mergers of smaller black holes. The event pushes the limits of gravitational-wave detection technology and theoretical models, requiring intricate models to accurately interpret the signal.

Scientists are continuing to refine their analysis of GW231123, hoping to uncover all of its implications. The data will be made available for other researchers to analyze. The findings will be presented at the GR-Amaldi meeting in Glasgow, Scotland, UK, in July 2025. The discovery highlights the importance of gravitational-wave astronomy in revealing the fundamental nature of black holes and the potential for further discoveries in the field.
chinese_title: LIGO探测到迄今为止质量最大的黑洞并合
chinese_summary:
LIGO-Virgo-KAGRA (LVK)合作组织于2023年11月23日探测到迄今为止质量最大的黑洞合并事件，编号为GW231123。这次强烈的合并产生了一个质量约为太阳225倍的最终黑洞，超过了2021年的前纪录保持者。该黑洞由两个质量分别约为太阳100倍和140倍，且高速旋转的黑洞碰撞形成。

这一发现挑战了当前黑洞形成的物理模型，因为通过标准恒星演化过程预计不会形成如此大质量的黑洞。研究人员认为，这些黑洞可能是通过较小黑洞的早期合并形成的。该事件突破了引力波探测技术和理论模型的极限，需要复杂的模型来准确解读信号。

科学家们正在继续完善他们对GW231123的分析，希望能揭示其所有意义。相关数据将提供给其他研究人员进行分析。该发现将于2025年7月在英国苏格兰格拉斯哥举行的GR-Amaldi会议上公布。该发现突显了引力波天文学在揭示黑洞的本质以及该领域进一步发现的潜力方面的重要性。

title: "English Translators of Homer": A Review
summary:
This is a review of Simeon Underwood's book "English Translators of Homer." The reviewer feels the title is misleading, as they expected a comparison of translations, whereas the book is a history of the translators themselves and their choices. The reviewer criticizes the book for being too short and lacking textual examples to illustrate Underwood's points about each translator's style.

Despite these shortcomings, the reviewer ultimately finds the book "good." It clarifies how to think about different translations and what to look for in them. Underwood's central argument is that translation is a balance between preserving the source text and creating a readable target text, especially challenging with poetry. He explores the dilemma of whether to capture the experience of an ancient reader or create a similar mood for a modern one.

The reviewer found chapters on Chapman, Pope, and Rieu dull, but appreciated the final chapter on Christopher Logue's "War Music," a modern adaptation of the Iliad. Logue's approach, though controversial, highlights the choices inherent in translation. The reviewer contrasts Logue's work with more literal translations like Lattimore's, which prioritizes line-by-line correspondence to the Greek. The reviewer points to Knox's scathing review of Logue as evidence of the stylistic divide, finding Knox's criticisms ultimately compelling. The reviewer prefers translations like Mitchell and Lombardo, but finds value in Logue's approach for opening new perspectives on the original text. The reviewer concludes that while the book has its flaws, it has valuable insights.
chinese_title: 荷马英译者：书评
chinese_summary:
西缅·安德伍德《荷马的英语译者》书评：评论者认为书名具有误导性，因为他们期望看到翻译的比较，而本书实际上是关于译者及其选择的历史。评论者批评该书篇幅过短，且缺乏文本示例来阐释安德伍德关于每位译者风格的观点。

尽管存在这些缺点，评论者最终认为这本书是“好的”。它阐明了如何思考不同的翻译以及在翻译中寻找什么。安德伍德的核心论点是，翻译是在保留源文本和创建可读目标文本之间取得平衡，这在诗歌方面尤其具有挑战性。他探讨了是捕捉古代读者的体验还是为现代读者创造相似的情绪这一难题。

评论者认为关于查普曼、蒲柏和里厄的章节很枯燥，但欣赏最后一章关于克里斯托弗·洛格的《战争音乐》的章节，这是《伊利亚特》的现代改编版。洛格的方法虽然备受争议，但突出了翻译中固有的选择。评论者将洛格的作品与更字面的翻译（如拉蒂摩尔的翻译）进行了对比，后者优先考虑与希腊语逐行对应。评论者指出诺克斯对洛格的尖刻评论证明了风格上的分歧，并发现诺克斯的批评最终令人信服。评论者更喜欢米切尔和隆巴多的翻译，但发现洛格的方法对于打开对原文的新视角具有价值。评论者总结说，虽然这本书有其缺陷，但它具有宝贵的见解。

title: Random selection is necessary to create stable meritocratic institutions
summary:
The article "Random selection is necessary to create stable meritocratic institutions" argues that true meritocracy is impossible to achieve without incorporating elements of random selection, or "lottocracy." The author contends that seemingly meritocratic systems inevitably devolve into self-perpetuating oligarchies where privilege and connections, rather than pure merit, determine success. This happens because advantages accumulate over generations, creating unequal starting points that are difficult to overcome.

The author argues that random selection, especially in leadership positions, acts as a necessary corrective. It prevents the entrenchment of power, disrupts existing networks of privilege, and introduces diverse perspectives. By occasionally bypassing the established hierarchy and giving opportunities to individuals from outside the traditional power structure, lottocracy helps ensure that the system remains open and responsive to new ideas and talent.

The piece emphasizes that lottocracy isn't about eliminating merit entirely; rather, it's about supplementing it to prevent the corruption and stagnation that inevitably accompany purely merit-based systems. title: When Sigterm Does Nothing: A Postgres Mystery
summary:
The ClickPipes team encountered a persistent bug where creating logical replication slots on Postgres read replicas would sometimes stall indefinitely, becoming unkillable and risking WAL retention leading to storage exhaustion. This was traced to the `XactLockTableWait` function in Postgres, which waits for older transactions to complete before creating the slot, ensuring a consistent point for decoding.

On primary Postgres instances, `XactLockTableWait` acquires a lock on the transaction ID, waiting until the transaction completes. However, on read replicas (hot standbys), the `LockAcquire` returns immediately, bypassing the intended interrupt handling. The function then enters a 1ms polling loop using `TransactionIdIsInProgress` and `pg_usleep`, which, due to the standby's indirect observation of primary transactions, can run indefinitely. The absence of interrupt checks in this loop renders the process unkillable via `SIGTERM` or `pg_cancel_backend`.

The team submitted a patch adding `CHECK_FOR_INTERRUPTS()` before each `pg_usleep` call within the loop, which was quickly accepted and backported to supported Postgres versions, allowing for process termination. Further improvements are being discussed to add a wait event and optimize the transaction completion waiting mechanism for standbys, potentially making it into Postgres 19. The issue highlights how well-written code can cause unexpected problems when used in contexts beyond its original design.
chinese_title: 当Sigterm失效时：一个Postgres谜团
chinese_summary:
ClickPipes团队遇到了一个持久性错误：在Postgres只读副本上创建逻辑复制槽时，有时会无限期停滞，变得无法终止，并可能因WAL保留导致存储耗尽。这被追溯到Postgres中的`XactLockTableWait`函数，该函数在创建槽之前等待较旧的事务完成，以确保解码的一致性点。

在主Postgres实例上，`XactLockTableWait`会获取事务ID上的锁，等待直到事务完成。然而，在只读副本（热备）上，`LockAcquire`会立即返回，绕过预期的中断处理。然后，该函数进入一个使用`TransactionIdIsInProgress`和`pg_usleep`的1毫秒轮询循环，由于备机对主事务的间接观察，该循环可能会无限期运行。此循环中缺少中断检查导致该进程无法通过`SIGTERM`或`pg_cancel_backend`终止。

该团队提交了一个补丁，在循环中每次调用`pg_usleep`之前添加了`CHECK_FOR_INTERRUPTS()`，该补丁很快被接受并反向移植到受支持的Postgres版本，从而允许进程终止。目前正在讨论进一步的改进措施，以添加等待事件并优化备机的事务完成等待机制，这可能会进入Postgres 19。这个问题突显了编写良好的代码在超出其原始设计范围的上下文中使用时，可能会导致意想不到的问题。

title: SQLite async connection pool for high-performance
summary:
`aiosqlitepool` is a high-performance connection pool for asyncio SQLite applications. It boosts performance by eliminating connection overhead, utilizing a "hot" cache for faster queries, and maximizing concurrent throughput. It's a layer that works with an asyncio driver like `aiosqlite`, not a replacement.

Key features include reusing connections to avoid repeated setup and teardown, keeping SQLite's in-memory page cache "hot" for frequently accessed data, and increasing the number of database queries processed per second.

Usage involves providing a connection factory, an async function that creates database connections. The pool manages connections, not transactions (requiring manual `commit()` or `rollback()`). Optimized SQLite pragmas for high-performance, such as `PRAGMA journal_mode = WAL`, are recommended.

`aiosqlitepool` integrates well with FastAPI using lifespan context managers for lifecycle management, app state for global access, and dependency injection for easy connection access.

While SQLite connection overhead is low, `aiosqlitepool` helps alleviate write contention in concurrent environments. It's recommended for services handling steady web traffic or high-throughput jobs, and applications needing predictable low latency or aiming for a minimal footprint. Benchmarks demonstrate significant improvements in queries per second and latency.

The library is compatible with drivers that implement `execute()`, `rollback()`, and `close()` methods, and it's officially tested with `aiosqlite`. It's available under the MIT License.

title: Show HN: Bedrock – An 8-bit computing system for running programs anywhere
summary:
Bedrock is a specification for a portable 8-bit computer system designed for longevity. It's not a physical device, but rather a standard that allows programs to run on any system with a Bedrock emulator, regardless of the underlying hardware. This emulator acts as a translator between the program and the system.

Key features include a small instruction set (32 instructions) and a limited number of devices (12), making it easy to learn and implement. Emulators exist for Windows, Linux, the web, and the Nintendo DS.

The article provides tutorials (e.g., printing a string), documentation (user manual, specification), and runnable examples demonstrating various algorithms. Implementations for both JavaScript (web-based) and Rust (Windows/Linux) are available.

Bedrock is inspired by the Uxn virtual machine but simplifies interfaces and instruction sets for better performance on resource-constrained systems. The name refers to a 'bedrock abstraction', focusing on simplifying the program environment instead of creating a higher-level instruction set.

The article concludes with live demonstrations running in a web-based emulator, including a pixel art program, snake game, microwave clock, system information display, and an on-screen keyboard for the Nintendo DS.

title: Context Rot: How increasing input tokens impacts LLM performance
summary:
This article explores how increasing input token length impacts Large Language Model (LLM) performance, a phenomenon termed "Context Rot." While LLMs perform well on simple retrieval tasks like "Needle in a Haystack" (NIAH), the authors demonstrate that performance degrades in more complex and realistic scenarios as input length increases, even when task complexity is held constant.

The study evaluates 18 LLMs across various parameters. Through controlled experiments extending the NIAH benchmark, the authors investigated the effects of needle-question similarity, distractors, needle-haystack similarity, and haystack structure. Their findings reveal:

*   Model performance consistently degrades with increasing input length.
*   Lower needle-question similarity exacerbates performance degradation.
*   Distractors have a non-uniform impact, highlighting model-specific vulnerabilities to irrelevant information, particularly as input length grows.
*   Needle-haystack similarity impacts performance, indicating the haystack's content is relevant.
*   Haystack structure (coherent vs. shuffled content) affects how models process long inputs.

The authors emphasize that real-world applications, which are more complex than NIAH, likely experience even more pronounced performance degradation due to context length. They provide the complete codebase for replicating their results, contributing to a deeper understanding of LLM behavior with long inputs. The study calls for a reassessment of long-context evaluations, moving beyond simple lexical retrieval to more representative and nuanced benchmarks.
chinese_title: 上下文腐烂：输入tokens增加如何影响LLM性能
chinese_summary:
长文本输入对大语言模型性能的影响：语境腐烂现象研究

本文探讨了输入文本长度增加如何影响大语言模型(LLM)的性能，这种现象被称为“语境腐烂”。虽然LLM在简单的检索任务（如“大海捞针”）中表现良好，但作者证明，随着输入长度的增加，即使在任务复杂性保持不变的情况下，在更复杂和真实的场景中，其性能也会下降。

该研究评估了18个具有不同参数的LLM。 通过扩展“大海捞针”基准测试的受控实验，作者研究了针-问题相似性、干扰项、针-草堆相似性和草堆结构的影响。他们的发现表明：

* 模型性能随着输入长度的增加而持续下降。
* 较低的针-问题相似性加剧了性能下降。
* 干扰项的影响不一致，突出了模型对不相关信息的特定漏洞，尤其是在输入长度增加时。
* 针-草堆相似性会影响性能，表明草堆的内容是相关的。
* 草堆结构（连贯与随机内容）会影响模型处理长输入的方式。

作者强调，现实世界的应用程序比“大海捞针”更复杂，由于上下文长度，可能会经历更明显的性能下降。他们提供了完整的代码库来复现他们的结果，有助于更深入地理解LLM在长输入情况下的行为。该研究呼吁重新评估长文本评估，从简单的词汇检索转向更具代表性和细致的基准测试。

title: The JPEG XL Image Coding History, Features, Coding Tools, Design Rationale
summary:

Authored by Jon Sneyers and eleven others, the paper details JPEG XL's history, design rationale, coding tools, and future potential. Its goal is to serve as a companion to the ISO/IEC 18181 standard or as a standalone resource for understanding JPEG XL.

JPEG XL is positioned as a next-generation image codec designed to replace older formats like JPEG, PNG, and GIF. It boasts state-of-the-art compression performance, lossless JPEG recompression capabilities, and advanced features.

The paper likely delves into the technical aspects of JPEG XL, covering its coding tools and underlying principles in considerable detail. title: The Moving Assembly Line Turns 100 (2013)
summary:
In October 2013, the world celebrated the 100th anniversary of Ford's moving assembly line, a pivotal innovation that revolutionized manufacturing. Implemented at Ford's Highland Park plant on October 7, 1913, the moving assembly line dramatically reduced Model T assembly time from over 12 hours to under three hours initially, and eventually to 93 minutes. This was achieved by having 140 assemblers stationed along a 150-foot chassis line, with the work brought to them.

The article emphasizes that the assembly line wasn't a singular invention but an evolution fueled by several factors: the need to meet Model T demand, benchmarking practices from other industries (meat-packing, mail-order, and canning), and the availability of electric-powered tools and conveyors.

Key figures like Clarence Avery and Charles Sorensen are highlighted for their roles in experimentation and implementation. Sorensen, as Ford's production chief, oversaw the installation of overhead conveyors and the overall refinement of the process, while Avery is often credited with first proposing the moving line concept.

The article also debunks the myth of Henry Ford being the sole inventor, crediting a team of talented individuals encouraged to experiment and innovate. It further highlights the absence of patents on the process due to Ford's opposition to them.

The assembly line's success led to a production surge and price reduction for the Model T. The article concludes with three key lessons: hire talented people and let them experiment, benchmark best practices from other industries, and develop and implement state-of-the-art technology.
chinese_title: 移动装配线百年纪念 (2013)

文章强调，装配线并非单一的发明，而是由多种因素推动的演变：满足Model T的需求、借鉴其他行业的实践（肉类包装、邮购和罐头）以及电动工具和输送机的可用性。

克拉伦斯·艾弗里和查尔斯·索伦森等关键人物因他们在实验和实施中的作用而受到重视。索伦森作为福特的生产主管，负责监督架空输送机的安装和整个流程的改进，而艾弗里通常被认为是第一个提出移动生产线概念的人。

title: Nearly 3 out of 4 Oracle Java users say they've been audited in the past 3 years
summary:
A recent survey reveals that Oracle Java users are increasingly facing audits and are migrating to open-source alternatives due to rising costs and complex licensing. The survey, conducted by Dimensional Research and commissioned by the ITAM Forum and Azul, found that 73% of Oracle Java users have been audited in the past three years. In response to Oracle's licensing changes, including a shift to per-employee pricing in 2023, nearly 80% of users have either migrated or plan to migrate to open-source Java.

Oracle's Java licensing policies, including four changes between 2020 and 2023, require users to upgrade to the latest version every three years for free support, driving many to consider open-source options. The survey highlights the cost of these audits, with 54% of participants spending over $100,000 annually on resolving non-compliance issues, and 27% spending over $500,000.

The complexity of modern software licensing and difficulties in tracking application usage across diverse environments were cited as major challenges.  ITAM professionals emphasize the need for increased resources and executive support to effectively manage software compliance and avoid costly penalties.  Only a small fraction (14%) of Oracle Java users intend to remain with the vendor's subscription model, signaling a significant shift in the Java landscape.

title: Transition to using 16 KB page sizes for Android apps and games
summary:
The Android Developers Blog announces the transition to 16 KB memory page sizes for Android apps and games, starting November 1st, 2025. New apps and app updates with native C/C++ code targeting Android 15+ submitted to Google Play *must* support 16 KB page sizes. Apps using only Kotlin/Java are already compatible.

This change aims to improve performance, with devices using 16 KB page sizes seeing performance boosts, including faster app launch times, improved battery life, and quicker camera starts.

Developers using native C/C++ code must recompile and potentially adjust their code for 16 KB compatibility. Android Studio provides tools to help:

*   **APK Analyzer:** Identifies native libraries and assesses 16 KB compatibility.
*   **Alignment Checks:** Warns about non-compliant libraries/APKs.
*   **Lint:** Highlights non-16 KB aligned native libraries.
*   **Android Gradle Plugin (AGP) 8.5.1+ and NDK r28+:** Automatically enable 16 KB alignment.

Developers should eliminate hardcoded assumptions about 4 KB page sizes and use `getpagesize()` or `sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE)` to dynamically determine page size.

Testing is crucial, and Android Studio offers a 16 KB emulator target. Compatible devices running Android 15 QPR1+ also offer a developer option to switch between page sizes for real-device testing.

The transition to 16 KB page sizes results in an improved user experience and a more performant Android ecosystem.

title: NeuralOS: An operating system powered by neural networks
summary:
NeuralOS is a project demonstrating an operating system simulated via neural generative models. The core idea involves using neural networks, specifically RNNs and diffusion models, to simulate the behavior and appearance of an operating system interface.

Lazarus was hired by Hugh Verrier, fascinated by the narrative of Davidson's supposed miraculous six-kilometer swim to shore, which experts deemed impossible. Verrier wanted to verify the truth behind the repeated claim.

Lazarus's research uncovered that Davidson was a PhD student travelling for a study trip. She located Davidson's family and a crucial newspaper clipping of his own account of the disaster. This revealed that the initial report in the Vancouver Province, claiming he swam to shore, was fabricated by a reporter. Davidson actually survived by being rescued by a lifeboat and taken to the Storstad.

The article also provides context on the Empress's final voyage and the events leading to its sinking. Fog and the Storstad's reinforced hull contributed to the rapid flooding and loss of life. The Empress sank in just fourteen minutes.

The article concludes by explaining why the Empress tragedy faded from public memory: the outbreak of World War I overshadowed the event, and many survivors, including Davidson, faced the horrors of war soon after. Lazarus's investigation debunks the myth of Davidson's heroic swim, revealing the inaccurate information perpetuated for over a century.

title: Strategies for Fast Lexers
summary:

This approach, while potentially complex and not supported by all compilers (like MSVC), significantly improves performance by reducing code density, cache misses, and branch prediction.

Another optimization is abstracting memory allocation using an **Allocator Interface**. This allows the user to choose different allocation strategies, such as garbage collectors or bump allocators. The interface includes functions for memory request, destruction, and statistics gathering, simplifying memory management within the lexer and other components. The article includes a CALL macro to streamline context passing and enable verbose allocation logging for debugging.

The author provides benchmark results demonstrating the impact of these optimizations, specifically the bump allocator implementation showing a 1.58x speed improvement in overall runtime.

title: C++ Coroutines Advanced: Converting std:future to asio:awaitable

title: Embedding user-defined indexes in Apache Parquet
summary:
This article demonstrates how to embed user-defined indexes within Apache Parquet files without breaking compatibility with standard Parquet readers. The core idea is to leverage Parquet's footer metadata and offset-based addressing to store index data within the file body and record its location in the footer as a key/value pair.

The authors argue that this approach offers a balance between the benefits of external indexes (improved query performance) and the simplicity of the Parquet format, avoiding the drawbacks of external indexes like increased complexity and synchronization risks.

The article provides a concrete example of embedding a "distinct value index," a set of unique values for a specific column, within a Parquet file. This index can be used to efficiently prune files during query execution, skipping those that don't contain relevant values. The example demonstrates how to serialize the index into a binary format, write it into the file body, record its location in the footer, and then extend Apache DataFusion's TableProvider to read and utilize the index for file-level pruning.

The benefits of this approach are highlighted: standard Parquet readers will simply ignore the unknown index bytes and key/value metadata, while engines aware of the custom index can leverage it for faster query execution. This method allows for various index types and granularities, enabling optimizations for file-level, row-group-level, or even row-level data access.

本文演示了如何在不破坏与标准Parquet读取器兼容性的前提下，将用户自定义索引嵌入到Apache Parquet文件中。其核心思想是利用Parquet的页脚元数据和基于偏移量的寻址方式，将索引数据存储在文件主体中，并在页脚中以键/值对的形式记录其位置。

作者认为，这种方法在外部索引的优势（提高查询性能）和Parquet格式的简单性之间取得了平衡，避免了外部索引的缺点，如增加复杂性和同步风险。

本文提供了一个具体的例子，将“唯一值索引”（特定列的一组唯一值）嵌入到Parquet文件中。该索引可用于在查询执行期间高效地修剪文件，跳过那些不包含相关值的文件。该示例演示了如何将索引序列化为二进制格式，将其写入文件主体，在页脚中记录其位置，然后扩展Apache DataFusion的TableProvider以读取和利用该索引进行文件级修剪。

文章强调了这种方法的优势：标准Parquet读取器将简单地忽略未知的索引字节和键/值元数据，而了解自定义索引的引擎可以利用它来实现更快的查询执行。这种方法允许各种索引类型和粒度，从而可以优化文件级、行组级甚至行级的数据访问。

title: Japanese grandparents create life-size Totoro with bus stop for grandkids (2020)
summary:
In Takaharu, Miyazaki Prefecture, Japan, a couple in their 70s crafted a life-size Totoro statue, complete with a bus stop, for their grandchildren. Inspired by the iconic scene from the Studio Ghibli film "My Neighbor Totoro," the grandparents meticulously built the statue using traditional plastering techniques, concrete, bricks, and careful sculpting.

The project involved constructing a barrel-like frame, layering concrete, adding bricks to achieve Totoro's plump shape, and sculpting the character's distinctive features like his eyes and whiskers. They also created a brick and gravel path and placed the bus stop sign.

The statue has become a local attraction, drawing Totoro fans from far and wide. The couple even provides a red umbrella, similar to the one in the film, for visitors to use in photos. The Totoro statue has brought joy not only to their grandchildren but also to Totoro enthusiasts globally, making the small town a destination for sightseeing and nostalgia.

title: A Century of Quantum Mechanics
summary:
This article commemorates the 100th anniversary of Werner Heisenberg's pivotal letter to Wolfgang Pauli on July 9, 1925, marking a turning point in the development of quantum mechanics. The letter reveals Heisenberg's radical efforts to discard the classical concept of electron orbits and replace it with a model based purely on observable experimental data. This approach led to his groundbreaking "Umdeutung" paper, considered the birth certificate of modern quantum theory.

The article highlights that Heisenberg's initial work, further developed by Born, Jordan, and Pauli, evolved into matrix mechanics, the first mature formulation of quantum theory, which underlies the Standard Model of particle physics, consistently proven accurate in CERN experiments.

The celebration of this anniversary prompts a reflection on quantum mechanics' impact, including its ongoing challenges, experimental innovations, and technological advancements. Quantum sensors are expanding into high-energy applications, and quantum simulations are being explored to overcome classical computing limitations in complex system modeling.

Despite its empirical success, the article notes that fundamental questions about the theory's true meaning remain unanswered, sparking theoretical and philosophical debates about the emergence of the classical world, the nature of the wavefunction, and the role of observers. Heisenberg's hopeful sentiment that future physicists will further unravel these mysteries continues to drive research in the field.
chinese_title: 量子力学的世纪
chinese_summary:
本文纪念维尔纳·海森堡1925年7月9日致沃尔夫冈·泡利的关键信件一百周年，这标志着量子力学发展的一个转折点。这封信揭示了海森堡彻底摒弃电子经典轨道概念，并用纯粹基于可观测实验数据的模型取而代之的激进努力。这种方法促成了他具有开创性的“重新诠释”论文，该论文被认为是现代量子理论的出生证明。

本文强调，海森堡的初步工作，经由玻恩、约旦和泡利的进一步发展，演变为矩阵力学，这是量子理论的第一个成熟表述，也是粒子物理标准模型的基础，该模型在欧洲核子研究中心的实验中一直被证明是准确的。

对这个周年纪念日的庆祝活动促使人们反思量子力学的影响，包括其持续存在的挑战、实验创新和技术进步。量子传感器正在扩展到高能应用领域，并且正在探索量子模拟，以克服经典计算在复杂系统建模中的局限性。

尽管量子力学在经验上取得了成功，但本文指出，关于该理论真正含义的基本问题仍然没有得到解答，这引发了关于经典世界涌现、波函数性质以及观察者作用的理论和哲学辩论。海森堡对未来物理学家将进一步解开这些谜团的乐观情绪继续推动着该领域的研究。

title: Lightning Detector Circuits
summary:
This article details various lightning detector circuits, primarily aimed at hobbyists and beginners. It begins with a simple, beginner-friendly design using a tuned inductor circuit operating near 200 kHz, coupled with a high input impedance Darlington transistor RF amplifier for sensitivity. The circuit is micro-power, drawing minimal current from batteries. A key advantage is the elimination of a tapped tuned circuit.

The article then explores alternative designs, including:

*   **Magnetic Antenna Version:** Employs a solenoid type inductor tuned to around 5 kHz, offering higher sensitivity to distant lightning but reduced sensitivity to certain local impulse sources.
*   **Compound Transistor Circuit:** Replaces the Darlington transistor with a compound transistor configuration, suitable for use with a CA3096 transistor array.
*   **Op-Amp Version:** Uses a micro-power op-amp to rectify more of the lightning pulse, extending the flash duration. However, this version is prone to false triggers from household appliances and is not recommended for general use.

Throughout, the author provides practical advice on component selection, construction techniques, and troubleshooting. The article emphasizes visual clarity with close-up photos and highlights the importance of understanding schematics as electrical connections rather than mechanical layouts. The piece concludes with a practical application of the op-amp version, using it to trigger a large LED lightning bolt lamp for visual effect.
chinese_title: 闪电探测器电路
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了各种雷电探测器电路，主要面向业余爱好者和初学者。首先介绍了一个简单易懂的入门级设计，该设计采用工作频率接近 200 kHz 的调谐电感电路，并结合高输入阻抗达林顿晶体管射频放大器以提高灵敏度。该电路采用微功率设计，从电池中汲取的电流极小。一个关键优势是无需抽头调谐电路。

然后，本文探讨了其他替代设计，包括：

*   **磁性天线版本：** 采用调谐至约 5 kHz 的螺线管式电感器，对远处闪电具有更高的灵敏度，但对某些局部脉冲源的灵敏度降低。
*   **复合晶体管电路：** 用复合晶体管配置取代达林顿晶体管，适用于 CA3096 晶体管阵列。
*   **运算放大器版本：** 使用微功率运算放大器来整流更多的闪电脉冲，从而延长闪光持续时间。但是，此版本容易受到家用电器引起的错误触发，因此不建议常规使用。

通篇，作者都提供了关于元件选择、构建技术和故障排除的实用建议。本文强调视觉清晰度，配有特写照片，并强调理解原理图作为电气连接而非机械布局的重要性。最后，文章以运算放大器版本的一个实际应用结尾，使用它来触发一个大型 LED 闪电灯，以产生视觉效果。

title: Lossless Float Image Compression
summary:
This article investigates lossless compression methods for floating-point images, particularly multi-layer images used in film composition. The author compares OpenEXR (with ZIP and upcoming HTJ2K compression), JPEG-XL, and a custom "MOP" (Mesh Optimizer + zstd) solution.

Key findings:

*   **OpenEXR ZIP:** A good baseline, and the author's recommended default.
*   **OpenEXR HTJ2K:** Offers slightly better compression ratios than ZIP but with noticeably lower compression and decompression performance. Future improvements in performance and multi-layer optimization are possible.
*   **JPEG-XL:** Can achieve better compression ratios than OpenEXR, especially at higher compression effort levels, but suffers from significantly slower compression and decompression speeds. The author suggests JPEG-XL is not a natural fit for multi-layered, floating-point images currently, being more targeted towards displayable images.
*   **MOP (Mesh Optimizer + zstd):** The standout performer. Mesh Optimizer alone provides comparable compression to EXR HTJ2K with superior speed. When combined with zstd, MOP achieves compression ratios similar to high-effort JPEG-XL, but with dramatically faster compression and decompression. The author positions this as a strong option for internal, lossless floating-point image compression.

The author concludes that while JPEG-XL has potential, OpenEXR ZIP remains a solid choice, and the custom MOP solution offers a compelling alternative for internal use due to its speed and compression ratio advantages. The article also notes the tests are performed on a limited data set and encourages further exploration, especially in lossy compression.
chinese_title: 无损浮点图像压缩
chinese_summary:
本文研究了浮点图像的无损压缩方法，特别是电影合成中使用的多层图像。作者比较了OpenEXR（使用ZIP和即将推出的HTJ2K压缩）、JPEG-XL和一个自定义的“MOP”（网格优化器 + zstd）解决方案。

主要发现：

*   **OpenEXR ZIP：** 良好的基线，也是作者推荐的默认选项。
*   **OpenEXR HTJ2K：** 提供了略优于ZIP的压缩率，但压缩和解压缩性能明显降低。未来在性能和多层优化方面可能有所改进。
*   **JPEG-XL：** 可以实现比OpenEXR更好的压缩率，尤其是在更高的压缩强度下，但压缩和解压缩速度明显较慢。作者认为JPEG-XL目前不太适合多层浮点图像，更适合于可显示图像。
*   **MOP（网格优化器 + zstd）：** 表现出色。仅网格优化器就能提供与EXR HTJ2K相当的压缩，且速度更快。与zstd结合使用时，MOP实现了与高强度JPEG-XL相似的压缩率，但压缩和解压缩速度要快得多。作者认为这是内部无损浮点图像压缩的强大选择。

作者总结说，虽然JPEG-XL具有潜力，但OpenEXR ZIP仍然是一个可靠的选择，并且自定义的MOP解决方案由于其速度和压缩率优势，为内部使用提供了一个引人注目的替代方案。文章还指出，测试是在有限的数据集上进行的，并鼓励进一步探索，尤其是在有损压缩方面。

title: SCP-055 is an "antimeme" – it erases itself from memory when observed
summary:
SCP-055 is a Keter-class SCP object classified as an "antimeme," meaning it erases itself from memory upon observation. Its containment involves a secure cement room with a Faraday cage at Site 19, but the reasons for its construction and containment procedures are unknown.

Despite personnel being able to observe, photograph, and record SCP-055, all details about its physical appearance, nature, behavior, and origins are immediately forgotten. This includes the circumstances of its acquisition by the SCP Foundation. Attempts to study or destroy SCP-055 have failed for unknown reasons. Its potential threat level is considered high, possibly involving physical harm or, more certainly, memetic/mental danger.

Analysis suggests SCP-055 might be an autonomous or remotely controlled agent, potentially observing or interfering with the Foundation, humanity, or other SCP objects. One researcher discovered that while the object itself cannot be remembered, negations about it can be. For example, personnel could remember that "SCP-055 is not spherical," allowing them to repeatedly deduce its existence. Survey teams experience distress from this cycle of remembering and forgetting, but long-term effects are minimal. Recommendations include assigning staff capable of remembering SCP-055 to critical sites.
chinese_title: SCP-055是一种“反模因”，它会在被观察时从记忆中抹除自身。

尽管人员能够观察、拍摄和记录SCP-055，但所有关于其物理外观、性质、行为和起源的细节都会立即被遗忘。这包括SCP基金会获取它的情况。出于未知原因，研究或摧毁SCP-055的尝试均告失败。其潜在威胁等级被认为很高，可能涉及身体伤害，或者更确定的是，模因/精神危险。

分析表明SCP-055可能是一个自主或远程控制的特工，可能正在观察或干预基金会、人类或其他SCP项目。一位研究人员发现，虽然该物体本身无法被记住，但关于它的否定陈述是可以的。例如，人员可以记住“SCP-055不是球形的”，从而使他们能够反复推断出它的存在。调查团队经历了这种记住和忘记的循环带来的痛苦，但长期影响很小。建议包括将能够记住SCP-055的工作人员分配到关键站点。

summary:

title: Data brokers are selling flight information to CBP and ICE
summary:
This article highlights the concerning practice of data brokers selling sensitive flight information to U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) and Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE). The Airlines Reporting Corporation (ARC), owned and operated by major airlines, collects and sells passenger data, including names, flight itineraries, and financial details, to CBP and ICE, bypassing warrant requirements and potentially hiding the source of the information.

ARC's Travel Intelligence Program (TIP) holds over a billion travel records, raising concerns about increased surveillance and potential misuse by law enforcement, especially given the current climate of heightened immigration enforcement. The article emphasizes that airlines, through ARC, are prioritizing profit over traveler privacy by selling this sensitive data.

The article argues that this practice contributes to a climate of creeping authoritarianism, where the government can track and potentially target individuals based on national, religious, or political affiliations. It also points to broader privacy concerns related to data brokers selling location data, internet data, and utility records to law enforcement agencies.

The article concludes by advocating for "privacy first" legislation that requires consent for data processing, the passage of the "Fourth Amendment is not for sale" act to prevent law enforcement from purchasing data without judicial review, and the enforcement of data broker registration laws. The goal is to protect individuals' privacy and prevent the government from using data brokers to circumvent constitutional safeguards.
chinese_title: 数据经纪人向美国海关与边境保护局和移民及海关执法局出售航班信息
chinese_summary:
本文揭露了数据经纪商向美国海关与边境保护局（CBP）和移民及海关执法局（ICE）出售敏感航班信息的令人担忧的做法。由主要航空公司拥有和运营的航空公司报告公司（ARC）收集并向CBP和ICE出售乘客数据，包括姓名、航班行程和财务详细信息，绕过搜查令要求，并可能隐藏信息来源。

ARC的旅行情报计划（TIP）拥有超过十亿条旅行记录，引发了人们对执法部门加强监控和潜在滥用的担忧，尤其是在当前移民执法力度加强的背景下。本文强调，航空公司通过ARC，正在通过出售这些敏感数据将利润置于旅客隐私之上。

本文认为，这种做法助长了一种渐趋专制的氛围，政府可以根据国籍、宗教或政治背景追踪并可能针对个人。它还指出了与数据经纪商向执法机构出售位置数据、互联网数据和公用事业记录相关的更广泛的隐私问题。

本文最后呼吁制定“隐私优先”立法，要求对数据处理进行同意，通过“第四修正案不得出售”法案，以防止执法部门在未经司法审查的情况下购买数据，并强制执行数据经纪商注册法。其目标是保护个人隐私，并防止政府利用数据经纪商规避宪法保障。

title: Cidco MailStation as a Z80 Development Platform (2019)
summary:
This article details the author's journey in repurposing a Cidco MailStation, a 2000s-era dedicated email terminal, into a Z80 development platform. The MailStation, with its Z80 processor, LCD, keyboard, and modem, presents a unique opportunity for retro computing enthusiasts.

The author outlines the MailStation's hardware specifications, including its Z80 processor, RAM, flash memory, modem, LCD, and keyboard. A key challenge is the Z80's limited address space, requiring memory banking for accessing additional memory.

Custom code can be loaded by leveraging the MailStation's "Clipmail" functionality or using a built-in hex editor. The author details a loader program, uploaded via a parallel port using a LapLink cable and a proxy computer (later replaced with a USB and then a WiFi loader), which simplifies code injection.

The development environment consists of an OpenBSD laptop with SDCC for compiling C and Z80 assembly. The author emphasizes the need to reimplement MailStation-specific functions for the LCD and keyboard and create custom tools due to the obsolescence of original development tools.

The article highlights the efforts to reverse engineer the MailStation's firmware, noting the challenges and eventual shift towards re-implementing necessary functionalities.

The main project is "msTERM," a terminal program enabling the MailStation to connect to BBSes using its internal modem or a parallel connection. This involved creating custom putchar and getchar routines, an ANSI escape code parser, and an interrupt service routine for modem communication.

The author has released the msTERM code and encourages collaboration, aiming to make the MailStation a more versatile platform. Further projects include a USB and Wifi loader, along with an example project, simplifying MailStation development for others.
chinese_title: Cidco MailStation 作为 Z80 开发平台 (2019)

作者概述了 MailStation 的硬件规格，包括其 Z80 处理器、RAM、闪存、调制解调器、LCD 和键盘。一个关键挑战是 Z80 有限的地址空间，需要内存分页才能访问额外的内存。

可以通过利用 MailStation 的“Clipmail”功能或使用内置的十六进制编辑器来加载自定义代码。作者详细介绍了一个加载程序，该程序通过并行端口使用 LapLink 电缆和代理计算机（后来被 USB 和 WiFi 加载器取代）上传，从而简化了代码注入。

文章重点介绍了对 MailStation 固件进行逆向工程的努力，指出了挑战以及最终转向重新实现必要功能的转变。

title: Cache Benchmarks
summary:
This document describes cache benchmark results for Memcache, Redis, Valkey, Dragonfly, and Garnet. The benchmarks focus on throughput, latency (measured at various percentiles and the absolute maximum), and CPU cycles. Persistence is disabled, and all connections are local UNIX pipes.

title: The IRS Is Building a System to Share Taxpayers' Data with ICE
summary:
In July 2025, ProPublica reported that the IRS, under the Trump administration, is developing a computer system to share taxpayer data with ICE, enabling mass deportations. This system would grant ICE unprecedented access to home addresses of individuals they seek to deport through an "on-demand" process.

The plan faced internal resistance, with IRS acting general counsel Andrew De Mello refusing to release millions of addresses due to legal concerns, leading to his ouster. Critics, including former IRS officials and privacy experts, fear the system violates taxpayer privacy laws and could result in incorrect addresses being used, targeting innocent individuals.

The blueprint reveals an automated system where DHS submits spreadsheets of names and previous addresses, and the IRS returns the most recent address on file. Experts worry about the potential for errors due to name matching instead of taxpayer identification numbers and the lack of independent verification of DHS requests.

The White House defends the system as legal and fulfilling Trump's campaign promise for mass deportations. However, concerns persist about expanding the agreement to include data on U.S. citizens. The article also highlights the influence of Elon Musk's DOGE, who restructured the IRS engineering staff and led efforts to create a master database. Senator Ron Wyden criticized the system as ripe for abuse, allowing "fishing expeditions" into IRS records.

title: Clang: -Wexperimental-lifetime-safety: Experimental C++ Lifetime Safety Analysis
summary:
This article describes the introduction of an experimental C++ Lifetime Safety Analysis in Clang, enabled by the flag `-Wexperimental-lifetime-safety`. This analysis aims to detect lifetime violations like use-after-free and dangling pointers using the concepts of "origins" and "loans" to track pointer lifetimes.

The changes include:

*   A new header file `LifetimeSafety.h` that defines the entry point `runLifetimeSafetyAnalysis` for the dataflow analysis. This function takes a `DeclContext`, a `CFG` (Control Flow Graph), and an `AnalysisDeclContext` as input.
*   A new diagnostic group `LifetimeSafety` added to `DiagnosticGroups.td` to group the related warnings.
*   A dummy warning `warn_experimental_lifetime_safety_dummy_warning` added to `DiagnosticSemaKinds.td` within the `LifetimeSafety` group.  This is intended as a placeholder to be replaced by actual lifetime safety warnings.
*   A new source file `LifetimeSafety.cpp` added to the `clangAnalysis` library in `CMakeLists.txt`.
*   Two additional files related to the analysis and testing.

The analysis is based on an RFC available at [https://discourse.llvm.org/t/rfc-intra-procedural-lifetime-analysis-in-clang/8629](https://discourse.llvm.org/t/rfc-intra-procedural-lifetime-analysis-in-clang/8629). The addition of the dummy warning suggests the analysis is in its early stages, and real warnings will be implemented later.

title: Lasagna Battery Cell
summary:
This article from AmazingRibs.com warns against creating a "lasagna cell," a type of galvanic corrosion that can occur when reactive metals (like aluminum foil) come into contact with acidic foods (like tomato sauce) in a reactive pan (like steel).

The author, Meathead, explains that the combination creates a small battery where the acid acts as an electrolyte, and the different metals serve as electrodes. This electrochemical reaction corrodes the aluminum foil, creating holes and potentially contaminating the food with metal ions.

The article highlights that this can happen not just with lasagna, but also with marinades, brines, and even when using the "Texas crutch" BBQ technique with foil in steel pans. The reaction is accelerated by heat.

To prevent this, the author and his science advisor, Prof. Greg Blonder, recommend using non-reactive containers made of glass, porcelain, enamel, or plastic (for storage only). For cooking, Pyrex is recommended for lasagna. When using the Texas crutch, plastic oven bags, butcher paper, or parchment paper are suggested as alternatives to foil. Insulated grates like teflon or enamel coated grates are also recommended.

A demonstration of galvanic corrosion, where aluminum foil connected to a steel muffin tin in tomato sauce with salt corroded, shows the effects of the reaction.

作者Meathead解释说，这种组合会形成一个小电池，酸充当电解质，不同的金属充当电极。这种电化学反应会腐蚀铝箔，产生孔洞，并可能用金属离子污染食物。

文章强调，这不仅会发生在千层面上，还会发生在腌料、盐水中，甚至在使用“德州拐杖”烧烤技术时，用铝箔包裹食物放在钢锅中也会发生。 热量会加速反应。

为了防止这种情况，作者和他的科学顾问Greg Blonder教授建议使用由玻璃、瓷器、珐琅或塑料（仅用于储存）制成的非反应性容器。对于烹饪，建议使用耐热玻璃烹饪千层面。 当使用德州拐杖时，建议使用塑料烤箱袋、牛皮纸或烘焙纸代替铝箔。 还建议使用绝缘烤架，如特氟龙或搪瓷涂层烤架。

一个电偶腐蚀的演示，其中连接到装有番茄酱和盐的钢制玛芬烤盘中的铝箔被腐蚀，展示了该反应的影响。

title: It took 45 years, but spreadsheet legend Mitch Kapor finally got his MIT degree

Kapor had left MIT to pursue a lucrative opportunity to adapt his stats programs for VisiCalc.

After founding Lotus and becoming a successful tech entrepreneur and investor, Kapor developed a "gap-closing investing" philosophy with his wife, focusing on supporting businesses that address the needs of underserved communities. Companies like HealthSherpa and LendStreet benefited from this approach.

Inspired by Aulet's joke, Kapor decided to complete the requirements for his degree, which involved an independent study and a thesis. His thesis explored the roots and development of his investing strategy, highlighting how it often led to backing entrepreneurs from marginalized groups. Kapor suggests this approach to diversity efforts is particularly relevant in the current political climate. At 74, Kapor received his degree in May, marking the end of a long journey.

summary:

title: Code highlighting extension for Cursor AI used for $500k theft
summary:
This article details how a blockchain developer lost $500,000 in crypto assets due to a malicious code highlighting extension for Cursor AI, a Visual Studio Code-based IDE. The extension, posing as a syntax highlighter for Solidity code, was available in the Open VSX registry and had been downloaded over 54,000 times. However, it was a fake and contained no syntax highlighting functionality, instead downloading and executing malicious PowerShell scripts.

The developer was tricked into installing the malicious extension because it ranked higher in search results than the legitimate one due to the Open VSX registry's ranking algorithm, which prioritizes recency along with other factors like download count. The PowerShell scripts installed ScreenConnect, a remote management software, allowing attackers to control the developer's computer.

The attackers then used ScreenConnect to upload VBScripts that downloaded further payloads, including the Quasar backdoor and a stealer that collected data from browsers, email clients, and crypto wallets. This allowed them to steal the developer's wallet passphrases and siphon off cryptocurrency.

After the initial malicious extension was removed, the attackers published another fake with the same name as the legitimate extension and inflated download numbers. They also employed similar tactics with other packages, including an npm package called "solsafe" and several Visual Studio Code extensions. The article emphasizes the growing threat of malicious open-source packages and recommends caution when downloading tools, verifying their authenticity, and using security solutions.

由于 Open VSX 注册表的排名算法优先考虑时间新近度以及下载量等其他因素，该开发者被欺骗安装了该恶意扩展程序，因为它在搜索结果中的排名高于合法的扩展程序。PowerShell 脚本安装了 ScreenConnect（一款远程管理软件），使攻击者能够控制该开发者的计算机。

然后，攻击者使用 ScreenConnect 上传 VBScript，下载更多有效载荷，包括 Quasar 后门程序和一个窃取器，该窃取器从浏览器、电子邮件客户端和加密钱包中收集数据。这使得他们能够窃取该开发者的钱包密码短语并窃取加密货币。

在最初的恶意扩展程序被删除后，攻击者发布了另一个与合法扩展程序同名的假冒程序，并人为地增加了下载量。他们还对其他软件包采用了类似的策略，包括一个名为“solsafe”的 npm 软件包和几个 Visual Studio Code 扩展程序。本文强调了恶意开源软件包日益增长的威胁，并建议在下载工具时保持谨慎，验证其真实性，并使用安全解决方案。

title: East Asian aerosol cleanup has likely contributed to global warming
summary:
This article investigates the link between East Asian efforts to reduce air pollution and the acceleration of global surface warming since 2010. Using simulations from eight Earth System Models, the study demonstrates that a 75% reduction in East Asian sulfate emissions leads to a global annual mean warming of 0.07 ± 0.05 °C. This warming is attributed to the unmasking of greenhouse gas-driven warming previously offset by aerosols.

Key findings include a rapidly evolving global warming trend, warming in the North Pacific, and a top-of-atmosphere radiative imbalance, all consistent with recent observations. The study highlights that East Asian aerosol cleanup is likely a key contributor to both the recent acceleration in global warming rate and Pacific warming trends.

The simulations reveal robust changes in temperature and precipitation due to reduced East Asian aerosol emissions. While the strongest warming (~1°C) occurs near the source region, significant warming also extends to the North Pacific. The study acknowledges inter-model variability and the influence of internal variability, emphasizing the need for large ensemble simulations to accurately quantify climate impacts of regional emissions changes. The findings suggest that the recent efforts to improve air quality in East Asia are significantly impacting the global climate, contributing to the acceleration of global warming.
